entry.p: Joshua Zader writes in to inform me that he has reprinted my essay The Art of Friendship at The Atlasphere (a "fan site", if you will, for admirers of Ayn Rand). I take a somewhat dim view of hardcore Randians in that essay, but once I get around to writing The Tao of Roark folks may see that perhaps the pursuit of beauty is not as far from Objectivist thinking as they may believe...
